context: does it work with the wii?
response: Yes. Just plug it in the GameCube ports on the top of the Wii. Just be sure that your Wii has the ability to play/use GameCube games and/or controllers before buying.

context: I have a 9yr old asking for this game, would this be appropriate and do you think it would be too difficult?
response: This game would be a bit difficult but if he has friends to play with (it's a great multiplayer game) it wont be too hard. There's no gore or gratuitous violence at all, so it's very appropriate for all ages in my opinion. I really love this game :)

context: Do you still have access to the memory card and game card slots without taking off the grip?

context: Where can I get a replacement usb cable for this mouse?  Mine shorted out.
response: You can most likely find a suitable one at Walmart. I know the one for this mouse has more of a squared and thinner end, so that's what you should look for. You can always buy a few different ones and return the ones that don't fit. Good luck.
